title: Twice in her Lifetime: A Women in Trade Regency Romance
description: Having lost her soulmate to death, will Sophia get a second chance at true love?  London, 1825. Sophia Noble is the city's only female hotelkeeper—a young widow mourning her beloved husband. Her life is disrupted when Prince Aleksey Mikhailovich Oldenburg-Romanov—Sasha to friends—makes a most scandalous appearance at her luxury hotel. He has a terrible reputation, yet Sophia sees a man worthy to be saved. When they become lovers, she soon realizes that she wishes for so much more. But can a prince and a woman in trade overcome the ghosts of their pasts and find happiness together?  A heart-warming love story about second chances, redemption and how true love defies death.  Length: 95,060 words Category: Regency romance
author: Isa Day
